meanings.definition: Not able to be used again.
meanings.sent1: The nonreusable plastic bags cannot be used multiple times.
meanings.sent2: The disposable plates are nonreusable after a single use.
meanings.sent3: It's like having a nonreusable ticket to a show that you can only use once.
meanings.sent4: The nonreusable batteries lost their power after a single use.
meanings.sent5: The nonreusable straws are harmful to the environment as they cannot be used again.

meanings.definition: Not designed to be used more than once.
meanings.sent1: The nonreusable camera is meant for a single use only.
meanings.sent2: The one-time use masks are nonreusable for safety reasons.
meanings.sent3: He bought a nonreusable pen that ran out of ink after one use.
meanings.sent4: The nonreusable keycard granted access only once before becoming invalid.
meanings.sent5: The nonreusable razor blades need to be replaced after a single use.
